code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MessageList=_ref=>{let{messages,loading,error,onDelete}=_ref;if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-status",children:"\u0417\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0437\u043A\u0430 \u0438\u0441\u0442\u043E\u0440\u0438\u0438..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-status chat-status-error",children:error});}if(!messages.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-status",children:"\u041F\u043E\u043A\u0430 \u043D\u0435\u0442 \u0441\u043E\u043E\u0431\u0449\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0439 \u2014 \u043D\u0430\u0447\u043D\u0438\u0442\u0435 \u043F\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043F\u0438\u0441\u043A\u0443!"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"message-list",children:messages.map(message=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"message-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"message-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message-author",children:message.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("time",{className:"message-time",children:new Date(message.timestamp).toLocaleString()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"message-text",children:message.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ghost-button",type:"button",onClick:()=>onDelete(message.id),children:"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C"})]},message.id))});};export default MessageList;
